name: Reed 2
description:
Reed is back!
...and the adventure continues, but not like before.

Just a tiny little creature, the latest creation of an old supercomputer...
Harsh trials and beautiful landscapes await in this challenging pixel art platformer.

Can you find all the secrets? Can you reach the end? - it's all up to you! ^_^

Features:
- Beautiful pixel art!
- Ambient music!
- Easy to control!
- Addictive gameplay!
- Difficult levels!
- Various traps!
- Achievements!
